Namespace: file

tem. file

Contains functions that provide interaction with the file system.
Source:
  • ../src/ADF/API/ADFAPI.js, line 1002

Namespaces

tem.file.FileSystem
tem.file.scratchPad
tem.file.upload

Methods

<static> browseForFile

Not available in Web Reports Pops up a "Browse" dialog that allows the user to select a file.

NOTE: For more information about this function, refer to the documentation for the Microsoft class, CFileDialog.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
extension String (optional, defaults to "*.*")
filters String (optional, defaults to "All Files (*.*)||")
initialPath String
Source:
  • ../src/ADF/API/ADFAPI.js, line 1021
Returns:
Upon selection of a file, the function returns its path. If empty, the user clicked the cancel button.
Type
String

<static> browseForFolder

Not available in Web Reports Pops up a "Browse" dialog that allows the user to select a folder.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
initialPath String
Source:
  • ../src/ADF/API/ADFAPI.js, line 1031
Returns:
Upon selection of a folder, the function returns its path. If empty, the user clicked the cancel button.
Type
String

<static> doBrowseDialogWithFlags

Not available in Web Reports This function allows specification of many of the flags which can be used to customize the behavior of the CFileDialog class. For details on these flags refer to the Microsoft documentation: CFileDialog and OpenFileName Structure
Parameters:
Name Type Description
extension String
filters String
forFolderFlag Boolean
initialPath String
fileMustExistFlag Boolean
pathMustExistFlag Boolean
noValidateFlag Boolean
hideReadOnlyFlag Boolean
overwritePromptFlag Boolean
createPromptFlag Boolean
noReadOnlyReturnFlag Boolean
noTestFileCreateFlag Boolean
allowMultiSelectFlag Boolean
